name: Chris Ledoux, A Singing Cowboy Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which Garth Brooks' song gave Chris Ledoux mass popularity?
questions.correct: Much Too Young (To Feel This Damn Old)
questions.explanation:
Much Too Young (To Feel This Damn Old).

	Worn out tape of Chris Ledoux, lonely women and bad booze.

questions.text: What type of transplant did Chris Ledoux have in September 2000?
questions.explanation:
Liver.

	He was suffering from Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis, the same disease that killed football great Walter Payton.

questions.text: Which rodeo event did Chris Ledoux become World Champion of in 1976?
options: The Closest Chris ever got to the rodeo is singing at them.

questions.text: How many albums did Chris Ledoux release on independent labels before getting a record deal with a major label?
questions.explanation:
22.

	A lot of these have been re-released since.

questions.text: What was his first Top 10 Country Hit?
questions.correct: Watcha Gonna Do With a Cowboy
questions.explanation:
Watcha Gonna Do With a Cowboy.

	He recorded it with Garth Brooks.

questions.text: What is the name of his band?
What state was Chris Ledoux born in?
questions.explanation:
Mississippi.

	Born in Biloxi, Mississippi then moved to Texas before settling in in Wyoming.

questions.text: What was the name of the first rodeo where he won an event?
What other field is Chris Ledoux acclaimed for?
questions.explanation:
Sculpture.

	At Casper College he made a bronze of a bronco rider which gave him great acclaim at the time.
